sources.title: Stage Door Canteen (1943) PATRIOTIC EXTRAVAGANZA
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Presents CLASSIC MOVIE MONDAY
Director: Frank Borzage
Stars: Cheryl Walker, William Terry

This patriotic extravaganza celebrates New York Cityâ€™s Stage Door Canteen, a WWII-era nightclub created for American and Allied servicemen to socialize with and be entertained by Broadway celebrities. Watch for Celebrity Cameos by Edgar Bergen, Charlie McCarthy, Harpo Marx, Katharine Hepburn, Ray Bolger, and MANY MORE!

sources.title: Stage Door Canteen (1943) Musical, Romance, War | Full Movie
sources.description:
"Dakota," a young soldier on a pass in New York City, visits the famed Stage Door Canteen, where famous stars of the theatre and films appear and host a recreational center for servicemen during the war. Dakota meets a pretty young hostess, Eileen, and they enjoy the many entertainers and a growing romance.

Director: Frank Borzage
Writer: Delmer Daves
Stars: Cheryl Walker, William Terry, Judith Anderson, Katharine Hepburn & Gypsy Rose Lee
Genres: Classics, Comedy, Musical, Romance, War

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: "Dakota" Smith (William Terry), a young soldier on a pass in New York City, visits the famed Stage Door Canteen, where famous stars of the theatre and movies appear and host a recreational center for servicemen during the war. Dakota meets a pretty young hostess, Eileen Burke (Cheryl Walker), and they enjoy the many entertainers and a growing romance.
metadata.Actors: Cheryl Walker, William Terry, Judith Anderson
